title: Screen going black while in game
body: While in game my screen will randomly go black and I won't have control of anything. Today is the first time this has started happening to me.

replies.body: same bug happens to me too!

This could be the result of the client not being able to properly interact with your graphics card. There are a number of factors that could cause this, but the most likely are either a malfunctioning driver or windows power settings. Our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) covers the most common solutions, so I recommend starting there.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
